sentence.Network_en: Some of this reasoning turned up in Mr. Pollan's best - selling " Omnivore's Dilemma. "

sentence.Network_en: Human species is omnivore ; it can be tamed as a lamb, or vicious as a dingo.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from French, from Latin omnivorus 'omnivorous'

means.word_mean: 1. a person who eats all kinds of foods
2. an animal that feeds on both animal and vegetable substances
